column4: Hello everyone.  I havent a question, though I will be reading others and I especially would like to thank all of you for your time in assisting others.
Noah504: I have had wow installed in WINE and Ventrilo fine for about 6 months now.  Let me know if you need help with it.
meh. WINE is just fine.  I actually have better FPS in wine.
i mostly play linux native games
